nodes.text: The arrack vine was a type of vine found on Lothal, though due to the mining activities of the Galactic Empire on the planet, it had become rare or extinct. The poet Holshef once recalled to Merei Spanjaf how prior to the arrival of the Empire, he could tell which week of spring it was by the shade of green in the grasslands, as well as the scent of arrack vine and jogan fruit.
